ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Do you think you have contracted COVID-19?
Notes: 1 = No, I have not had any symptoms of COVID-19 (such as a cough or fever); 2 = No, I have been tested for COVID-19 and was told that I did not have it; 3 = Yes, I have had symptoms of COVID-19 (such as a cough or fever), but I have not been tested for it; 4 = Yes, I have been tested for COVID-19 and a doctor or other health care professional told me that I had it

ElementDescription: If you have had symptoms of COVID-19, did you try to see a doctor or other health care professional?
Notes: 0 =  No, I did not try to see a doctor or other health care professional; 1 =  Yes, I tried to see a doctor or other health care professional, but was not able to get medical help; 2 =  Yes, I saw a doctor or other health care professional; 3 =  Not applicable ï¿½ I have not had any symptoms of COVID-19

ElementDescription: Have you received a vaccine to prevent COVID-19?
Notes: 1 = Yes, I have received at least one dose of a vaccine; 2 = No

ElementDescription: Thinking about vaccines to prevent COVID-19, do you think you will . . .
Notes: 1 = Definitely get a vaccine; 2 = Probably get a vaccine; 3 = Probably NOT get a vaccine; 4 = Definitely NOT get a vaccine

ElementDescription: How much of a reason, if any, is each of the following for why you will probably/definitely not get a vaccine to prevent COVID-19? : Concern about side effects
Notes: 1 = A major reason; 2 = A minor reason; 3 = Not a reason

ElementDescription: How much of a reason, if any, is each of the following for why you will probably/definitely not get a vaccine to prevent COVID-19? : Do not think I need it
Notes: 1 = A major reason; 2 = A minor reason; 3 = Not a reason

ElementDescription: How much of a reason, if any, is each of the following for why you will probably/definitely not get a vaccine to prevent COVID-19? : Want to know more about how well they work
Notes: 1 = A major reason; 2 = A minor reason; 3 = Not a reason

ElementDescription: How much of a reason, if any, is each of the following for why you will probably/definitely not get a vaccine to prevent COVID-19? : Do not get vaccines in general
Notes: 1 = A major reason; 2 = A minor reason; 3 = Not a reason

ElementDescription: How much of a reason, if any, is each of the following for why you will probably/definitely not get a vaccine to prevent COVID-19? : The vaccines were developed and tested too quickly
Notes: 1 = A major reason; 2 = A minor reason; 3 = Not a reason

ElementDescription: How much of a reason, if any, is each of the following for why you will probably/definitely not get a vaccine to prevent COVID-19? : Have seen too many mistakes from medical care system in the past
Notes: 1 = A major reason; 2 = A minor reason; 3 = Not a reason

ElementDescription: How much of a reason, if any, is each of the following for why you will probably/definitely not get a vaccine to prevent COVID-19? : Can't get it for medical reasons
Notes: 1 = A major reason; 2 = A minor reason; 3 = Not a reason

ElementDescription: What motivated you to get the vaccine?: Other
What motivated you to get the vaccine?: None of the above
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I had side effects from previous doses
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I am worried about possible side effects from another dose
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I do not think the vaccine is effective against the variants currently circulating
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I am worried about the out of pocket costs of getting vaccinated
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I recently had COVID-19
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I do not think I am at risk for severe outcomes due to COVID-19
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I have had trouble accessing a vaccine at a time (or venue) that works for me
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: I just have not gotten around to it yet
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: My doctor said I did not have to get it
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: Other
Which of the following influenced your decision to not get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?: None of the above
In the past 6 months, has anyone close to you (e.g., family, friends) gotten a COVID-19 vaccine?
Are you planning to make an appointment to get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine in the next month?
Notes: 1= No I am not planning on making an appointment; 2= Yes I am planning on making an appointment; 3= Yes I have already made an appointment; 98= Do not know / Not sure

ElementDescription: Do you feel you need to gather more information about the COVID-19 vaccine before deciding whether or not to get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?
Do you feel you need to talk to a health care provider about the COVID-19 vaccine before deciding whether or not to get another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?
How likely are you to seek out more information about the vaccine in the next month?
Notes: 1= Very likely; 2= Somewhat likely; 3= Not likely; 98= Do not know

ElementDescription: How likely are you to make time to get a vaccine in the next month?
Notes: 1= Very likely; 2= Somewhat likely; 3= Not likely; 98= Do not know

ElementDescription: What would you consider when deciding whether or not to receive another dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?
Notes: 1 = Risk of illness due to COVID; 2 = Risk of vaccine side effects; 3 = Risk of getting others sick; 4 = Side effects from previous COVID-19 vaccine doses; 5 = My age; 6 = Any health conditions I have; 7 = Doctor recommendations = 8 = CDC or FDA recommendations; 9 = How well the vaccine works against the current variants; 10 = Out of pocket costs of getting vaccinated

ElementDescription: Have you received a COVID-19 vaccine since baseline?
When did you receive your most recent dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?
Which vaccine did you get (i.e., manufacturer)?
Notes: 1= Pfizer/BioNTech; 2= Moderna; 3= Novavax; 4= Do not know / Not sure

ElementDescription: What motivated you to get the vaccine?: I want to avoid getting infected with COVID-19
What motivated you to get the vaccine?: It will help protect me from getting very sick
What motivated you to get the vaccine?: It will help protect others around me
